metadata.synopsis: Plaque Narrator AD for a head bust in Gortash's Office
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to Gortash office. - Click on the plaque

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Carric started from nothing, built a financial empire and founded the Counting House. He refused to mingle with the other patriars, saying, "They didn't want me when I was an urchin, and now they can't have me."*
